ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Take this course! Even if you are not a specialist of Latin America the themes and problems we discussed are applicable to many contexts. This course would be useful for any history student, but also students in anthropology, political science, American studies, and literature.
Yes, I would strongly recommend this course to any student interested in Latin America.

A good overview of cultural Marxist scholarship about Latin America. If you don't know much about Latin American history, it's helpful to read some background to ground the case studies that we read about.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
